code: @Test public void kotlinVersionPropertyIsSet() {     String output = this.gradleBuild.build("kotlinVersion", "dependencies", "--configuration", "compileClasspath").getOutput().     assertThat(output).containsPattern("Kotlin version: [0-9]\\.[0-9]\\.[0-9]+"). }

@Test public void kotlinCompileTasksUseJavaParametersFlagByDefault() {     assertThat(this.gradleBuild.build("kotlinCompileTasksJavaParameters").getOutput()).contains("compileKotlin java parameters: true").contains("compileTestKotlin java parameters: true"). }

@Test public void kotlinCompileTasksCanOverrideDefaultJavaParametersFlag() {     assertThat(this.gradleBuild.build("kotlinCompileTasksJavaParameters").getOutput()).contains("compileKotlin java parameters: false").contains("compileTestKotlin java parameters: false"). }
